thread.section_title: Hotel Marignan Champs-Elysees - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Awesome...
thread.title_full: Awesome... - Review of Hotel Marignan Champs-Elysees, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: bubbleton
title: Awesome...
text:
Hotel Marignan Champs-Elysees is perfectly situated, and from the moment we stepped out of our taxi for a 4 day getaway in Paris until we got back into a taxi we were met by smiling very diligent staff .
Room was beautiful, the service outstanding and the 10+ course dinner in the restaurant nothing shy of magnificent...
